title: Public Release of OPERATION: WITNESS Materials

|comments=
**Co-written by [[*user Jasiu06]] and [[*user Ralliston]]**

**[http://scp-pl.wikidot.com/doslownie-1984 ► Jasiu06's Authorpage]**
**[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ralliston-s-authorpage ► Ralliston's Authorpage]**
]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

@@ @@

> [...] **OPERATION: WITNESS** denotes the long-term joint PENTAGRAM/North America UNGOC PHYSICS Division attempts at calming the ongoing storm spawned by the [[[no-return-hub|global 2021 collapse]]] [[[hour-zero|of the Veil protocol]]]. Under this operation, it continued to release a series of social campaigns aimed at educating the US public about the strange -- and oftentimes terrifying -- new world.
> 
> In an attempt to win the fight for the "control of the public opinion" between itself and Vanguard, it continued to spread a series of educational and informational materials all over the United States -- and, in some cases, other countries -- hoping they would be enough to gain the approval of society. Below attached are a select few, alongside relevant documentation. [...]
> 
> //-- Excerpt from "Public Release of OPERATION: WITNESS Materials" by Alice Sharp, released by the unVeiled magazine (2049)//

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="blockquote"]]
= **[[size larger]]Public Release of OPERATION: WITNESS Materials[[/size]]**

-----
[[=image poster1.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [# "The Invisible War," or: how the real world became revealed (Aviatica, 2022-2024)]//

-----
[[=image poster5.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [[[another-goddamn-magic-system|Transcript of the Magical Self-defence Orientation by Prof. Tilda Moose (Vanguard Academic Consortium, 2026)]]]//

-----
[[=image poster6.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [# The Many Dangers of Unreality Housing  (Micheals-Reynders University, 2031)]//

-----
[[=image poster4.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [[[vikander-kneed-worldwide-news-network|Memetic Terrorism and Cognitohazards in Marketing, a guide-seminar by Vikander-Kneed Technical Media (Unknown Author, 2035)]]]//

-----
[[=image poster2.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [# The Kingdom of Oberon, the Fourth Uprising, and the rise of Fae independence in the wake of the 21st century (The Sidhe Lounge, 2040)]//

-----
[[=image poster8.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [[[the-first-occult-flame-war|Online Paratrolling And You: A Guide For Concerned Parents (Global Occult Coalition PSYCHE Division, 2043)]]]//

-----
[[=image poster3.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [[[kte-9817-bluebuster-mendel-shelley-renegade-armbrusteri|An Epidemiology Report of the Global KTE-9817-Bluebuster-Mendel-Shelley-Renegade-Armbrusteri Pandemic (World Parahealth Organization, 2048)]]]//

-----
[[=image poster7.png style="border: solid 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); box-sizing: border-box; width: 85%;"]]
-----

= //**Relevant documentation:** [# Case #182-GFDS/G97: The fall of Oneiroi Incorporated and the resulting damage to the global oneirosphere (The International Court For the Paranormal, 2049)]//
